name: Bulls & Cows - Family Fun
description:
Known to all "Bulls and Cows" is one of the favorite logical games of all times.
Includes nice graphics and sound effects that will give you a great pleasure while playing.



HOW TO PLAY:
It's all about numbers! Try to guess the random numbers.
If the number position is correct you get 1 bull, but if the position is not correct you get a cow.

It is not as easy as it looks! Try this challenging game now.
